name: Community in Downtown San Francisco
description: Programs available: - ART CLASSES - EDUCATIONAL CLASSES - FITNESS CLASSES - MEALS Meals provided 7 days a week by Project Open Hand provide warm breakfast and lunch to older adults (age 60+) and adults with disabilities (age 18-59). They have dine-in or take out offerings. Proof of Vaccine required to dine-in. Breakfast hours are 9 AM - 10 AM Lunch hours are 11 AM - 12 PM Service Location: 481 O’Farrell St., San Francisco, CA 94102
